headline: Verizon Outage Hits Nearly 180,000 Users
summary: The telecommunications company said it is working to resolve an issue with wireless and data services.

headline: Pine Reveals Its 2025 ‘Consumer Friction’ Index
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., January 14, 2026--Pine, the trusted AI agent for consumers’ digital chores that delivers results, today revealed its Consumer Friction Index – the top companies people use Pine for most to lower their bills, seek compensation, cancel subscriptions, correct delivery issues and address other problems that they find too complicated, frustrating or time consuming to fix alone.

headline: T-Mobile Expands Long-Term Partnership With Netcracker for Cloud Platform to Facilitate Digital-First Services
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., January 14, 2026--T-Mobile expands its partnership with Netcracker to unlock new levels of speed, scale and flexibility for partners and customers.

headline: NextNav: The Only Things That Will Matter Are Getting FCC Approval
summary: NextNav's role as a GPS backup and 5G spectrum play offers major upside for Laughing Water Capital. Learn more about the FCC approval process and valuation.
